title: Help Your Teen Value Inner Beauty
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Lee Nienhuis
itunes:summary:
Social media adds even more pressure to teens who are already self-conscious about their appearance. John and Danny describe important conversations to have with teens about beauty and body image.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Lee Nienhuis' book "Brave Moms, Brave Kids" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-12-01?refcd=1037001

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/help-your-teen-value-inner-beauty/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
